channel.title: Mac on The Culture of Code
channel.description: Recent content in Mac on The Culture of Code

item.title: Syncing iTunes Library Between two Computers
item.description: Given: Two family Macs with iTunes 12 installed More than 10GB of audio files I want to share my media library between these two computers and keep them synchronized. When I add new file on one computer, it should apear on another. When I delete a file on second computer - it should be deleted pn first. When I change iTunes playlists on one computer it should be changed on another.
